title: Nelson Mandela’s Hands, An Art World Albatross
itunes:title: Nelson Mandela’s Hands, An Art World Albatross
description:
An art collector has gone “to hell and back” trying to sell a unique treasure.

Host: Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
